50% perma concealment.

It is what it is. The use for SCV can be discussed for sure, but it is in no way a bad feat when you top it with ED. 
It's possible to go dual-wield without to much hassle. In the pre-epics there's not much to work with, but dropping Shield and IKD, or even KD, IKD (not recommended). In the Epics you must forego either EP or AS. 

I will post an alternate version later without SCV, but with Dual-Wield.
